divs: Sighting Detailshello i have lived in las vegas nv just about all my life i have seen very stage thing here but allmost everything i have seen in over sunraise mountan from the time i was just a kid i am now 29 and tonight just anothing thing i saw 2 lights at the mouton again this has been happen for a long time now but i dont understand y no one ever reports it i had video and gave it the the locel news and never saw it again so i thought i would go up there my self like i did tonight and to my saprise i was chast off by the milatery and it is a public road and a car foled me home tonight maybe its nothing but i would like to talk to someone about this in more detale so please email me at
